summary.Title: Neighbourhood Copenhagen Airport is seeking application for flexible Cafe assistants
summary.JobHeadline: Neighbourhood Copenhagen Airport is seeking application for flexible Cafe assistants

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Neighbourhood Copenhagen Airport is seeking application for flexible Cafe assistants
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are hiring service minded employees 

What will you do? 

  • Catering, serving, receiving and speaking to guests
  • Ensure guests have a good experience
  • Cashing responsibilities
  • Keeping your work environment clean and tidy
  • Manage, replenish stock and assist with inventory control
  • Effective time management and handover
  • Ensure food safety and hygiene protocol
  • Flexible to work in all shifts between 04:00 hrs to 00:00 hrs.

Who are you?

  • Freshers or experienced in cafes or restaurants
  • Flexible to work in all shifts
  • Willingness to learn on-the-job
  • An excellent team player
  • You become happy when guests become happy
  • You can peak when it gets busy
  • You like to work in a team
  • Business proficiency in English
  • At least one Scandinavian language is desirable
  • Will have to provide documentation and a clear criminal record for the last 5 years to pass security checks to work at the airport. For more information please refer to  https://www.retsinformation.dk/eli/lta/2004/979

What do we offer?

  • Flexibility 
  • Salary, benefits and working conditions as per the collective agreement
  • Staff meal and discounts
  • A fun work environment
  • Learning and development opportunities to support career aspirations and growth

What's Next? 

If you want to join us in this exciting adventure & be a part of the HMSHost by Avolta family, apply now by telling us why you are our new team member.
